titleInfo.title: Program, The Nashville Community Playhouse, presentation of “Joan of Lorraine,” 1947

mods.identifier: Wilhelmina Webb Collection Nash Community Playhouse progs 1940-47 Joan of Lorraine 001 - 016

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A Nashville Community Playhouse program for a theatrical production of Maxwell Anderson’s “Joan of Lorraine,” presented May 28th-June 4th, 1947. The production was directed by Raymond Johnson; Setting by Robert L. Gwinn; and Lighting by Bill [Alder?]. The actors in the production are: Frances Carter Steele, Vince Harding, James Maddux, Robert L. Booth, Clarence Seligman, John Thompson, Gene Sullivan, Wyman Kane, Milton Carney, Jimmy Denham, Barbara Bachman, Bill Alder, Florence Kottler, Charlotte Pigg, Kathleen Whitehurst, Jim Reppert, and Jon Sandefur. Forms part of the Wilhelmina Webb Collection. 1 program.
